desc: The only table tennis facility in the Philippines with branches from NCR to Cavite! Green Paddle not only has all the table tennis items you might need, we also have a state-of-the-art training center equipped with the best coaches. It's the one-stop-shop for all of your table tennis needs! Come visit us now!

layout.text: Our branches come equipped with the best-in-class table tennis training equipment and stationed with top-notch coaches!
